PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-12922018-10-19,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectOrder Amending Part 2 of Schedule 1 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
PrecisOrder Amending PART 2 OF SCHEDULE 1 TO THE GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT to add a list of provinces, territories and areas to Part 2 of Schedule 1 in order to have Part 2 of the Act apply in these backstop jurisdictions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0212 Publication Date: 2018-10-31
AttachmentsAttachment
